H0.text: The king of what country became Iceland's ruler by treaty in 1262. Denmark

H1.text: The king of what country became Iceland's ruler by treaty in 1262. England

H2.text: The king of what country became Iceland's ruler by treaty in 1262. Sweden

H3.text: The king of what country became Iceland's ruler by treaty in 1262. Noreg

A4.text: The Old Covenant (Gamli sáttmáli) established a union with the Norwegian monarchy in 1262–1264.

A5.text: The Norwegian king's power over Iceland increased throughout the 13th century, culminating in the Old Covenant.
